title: Duck & Goose Go to the Beach
description: Take a trip to the beach with the beloved, classic, and New York Times –bestselling feathered friends Duck & Goose! Now an animated series, available to stream on Apple TV+!Duck wants to go on an adventure. But Goose isn't so sure. Together, the two best friends set off on a walk that takes them through the meadow, past a shady thicket, and over a distant hill, all the way to a place they've never been before—the beach! Turns out, Goose loves the ocean. But guess who doesn't?“Charming, funny, simple, and surprising. . . . Hills is master of the light comic touch.” — The Boston Globe
author: Tad Hills
